entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Owen Sound

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
